## The best cafe in Roseville, NSW Australia


```{r pressure, echo=FALSE}
library(leaflet)

my_marker <- makeIcon(
  iconUrl = "cup-of-coffee.png",
  iconWidth = 50, iconHeight = 50,
  iconAnchorX = 25, iconAnchorY = 25,
)
#  iconSize = c(20, 20),
#  iconAnchor = c(10, 10)
#)


my_map <- leaflet() %>% addTiles() %>% addMarkers(lat=-33.78404,lng=151.17863, popup = "Calibrate Coffee",icon = my_marker)
my_map
```
